Title: 20. City of Others: Asian Artists in Paris
Description: 2nd Apr-17th Aug  Image adapted from: @nationalgallerysingapore via Instagram National Gallery Singapore presents City of Others: Asian Artists in Paris â€“ a new exhibition that brings to light the interactions and influences between the local and migrant artists in the French capital. Explore themes of identity, belonging, cultural exchange, and creativity from the POV of Asian artists who exhibited their work in Paris while living in the city during the 1920s-1940s. Over 200 artworks including paintings, sculptures, and lacquerware will be on display, spread across 3 galleries.
